<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update draft_document column of HR Case to refer to the respective draft_document row.</description>
        <name>Populate draft_document for HR Case</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var draftdoc = new GlideRecord('draft_document');
draftdoc.addQuery('active', 'true');
draftdoc.query();

var hrCoreUtils = new hr_CoreUtils();
while (draftdoc.next()) {
    var caseId = "";
    var table = draftDoc.getValue('table');
    //check that table is not empty (isCase will return true if it is)
    if (!table.nil() && hrCoreUtils.isCase(table))
        caseId = draftdoc.document;
    else
        continue;

    var caseRec = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_core_case');
    if (caseRec.get(caseId)) {
        caseRec.setValue('draft_document', draftdoc.getUniqueValue());
        caseRec.update();
    }
}]]></script>
